value.description:
# Serving a TensorFlow MNIST Digit Recognition Model
This example shows you how to use TensorFlow Serving components to export a trained TensorFlow model
and use the standard tensorflow_model_server to serve it on OpenPAI.
This example uses the simple Softmax Regression model introduced in the TensorFlow tutorial for handwritten image (MNIST data) classification.
Reference https://www.tensorflow.org/tfx/serving/serving_basic.
value.name: sdk_test_jobcc36e057

prerequisites.description: This is an [example TensorFlow Serving Docker image on OpenPAI](https://github.com/Microsoft/pai/tree/master/examples/serving).
prerequisites.name: tf_serving_example

createdTime.description: job created time, in number of milliseconds since the Unix Epoch.

virtualCluster.description: virtual cluster to which the job submitted, or "unknown"

totalGpuNumber.description: total gpu number used in the job

totalTaskRoleNumber.description: total task role number used in the job

debugId.description: md5 hash name for the job in framework controller, used for debug purpose

createdTime.description: job created time, in number of milliseconds since the Unix Epoch.

completedTime.description: job completed time, in number of milliseconds since the Unix Epoch.

appLaunchedTime.description: job launched time for last attempt, in number of milliseconds since the Unix Epoch.

appExitTriggerTaskRoleName.description: task role name which triggered job completion

appExitTriggerTaskIndex.description: task index which triggered job completion

virtualCluster.description: virtual cluster to which the job submitted, or "unknown"

taskStatuses.description: task statuses in the task role

containerLog.description: log url of the task container

name.description: String in ^[a-zA-Z0-9_-]+$ format, no longer than 255 characters.

instances.description: Default is 1, instances of a taskRole, no less than 1.

dockerImage.description: Should reference to a dockerimage defined in prerequisites.

shmMB.description: Config the /dev/shm in a docker container.

infiniband.description: Use InfiniBand devices or not in a docker container.

cpu.description: CPU number, unit is CPU vcore.

gpu.description: GPU number, unit is GPU card.

additionalProperties.description: Port number for the port label.

extras.description: Extra field, save any information that plugin may use.
